body:
Hi Francesco, Mohammad and Abraham, Thank you for the nice comments.



- The installer takes care of copying both the libraries and the userobjects.

- Honeybee[+] has dependencies on Ladybug[+]. That's why there is also a folder for ladybug.

- Both the legacy version and the new release works with latest release of the radiance. As a matter of fact any release after version 5.0.a.11 is good. [We found a bug](https://unmethours.com/question/17201/rcontrib-misses-one-of-the-modifiers-if-number-of-modifiers-between-240-420/?comment=17658#post-id-17658) in radiance during the development which is fixed in 5.0.a.11 release.



PS: I updated the installation files to include the sample files. You can also find them [here](https://github.com/ladybug-tools/honeybee-grasshopper/tree/master/plugin/grasshopper/sampleFiles).
